quoteText:
Crowdmark will not sell, rent, license, or trade your personal information with third parties for their own direct promotional or marketing use unless Crowdmark receives your express consent to do so.
Unless you provide consent to do so, Crowdmark will not share your personal information other than as specified in this Privacy Policy.
title: This service does not sell your personal data without your consent

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data
tosdr.tldr: From Privacy Policy: "Crowdmark will not sell, rent, license, or trade your personal information with third parties for their own direct promotional or marketing use unless Crowdmark receives your express consent to do so. Unless you provide consent to do so, Crowdmark will not share your personal information other than as specified in this Privacy Policy."
